prompt: Can you list translation services with live interpreters and their 2-day pricing?

hidden_queries: translation services with live interpreters pricing 2 day rates live interpreter services
translation services offering live interpreters cost or pricing 2 day events interpretation services pricing
DayInterpreting pricing prepaid credits or costs interpretation service pricing phone interpreters DayInterpreting.com
Interprefy interpretation service cost example or rate for a 2-day event Interprefy pricing interpreters included pricing

sources.title: Day Translations, Inc :: Support - DayInterpreting
sources.snippet: We offer on-demand interpreting services through our DayInterpreting platform with zero upfront costs or no setup charges. Our pricing model is flexible to work with your specific interpretation needs! We don’t bind you into contracts or minimum spend for our pay-as-you-go pricing. If you are a business that needs pay-as-you-go, buy prepaid credits from our dashboard and use them for the ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are translation/interpretation services that provide live interpreters with available or typical pricing info you can use to estimate a 2-day cost (rough numbers or billing models; exact quotes usually require contacting the provider): DayInterpreting (DayTranslations platform) • On-demand live phone/video interpreters you can connect to instantly, pay-as-you-go with prepaid credits (no subscription/minimum) and charged per minute. • Example: common languages ~$1.25/minute (no setup, credits don’t expire) from provider info. Day Interpreting

2-day estimate: if you used 8 hours/day (~960 minutes × 2 = 1,920 min) × $1.25 = ≈ $2,400 (per language; actual usage and rates vary). Interpreters Unlimited (telephone interpreting) • Live phone interpreting available 24/7, pricing typically per minute. • Starting rates around $2.20/minute for many languages. Interpreters

2-day estimate: 1,920 min × $2.20 ≈ $4,224 (per language). Professional Freelance/Agency Interpreters • Agencies or individual interpreters booked directly often charge daily or half-/full-day rates. Typical human interpreter costs (not tied to a specific company quote) range roughly: $300–$800 per day per interpreter for conference/simultaneous work; specialized or rare languages can be $1,000+ per day. Langpros Language Solutions Dubai

2-day estimate: $600–$2,000+ per interpreter (plus project management/equipment for simultaneous). Interprefy (Remote Simultaneous Interpretation Platform) • Provides a remote simultaneous interpretation platform with certified interpreters, tailored pricing bundled by event hours. • No public per-day price listed; pricing is customized based on number of languages, event length, session count and services. G2+1

2-day estimate (illustrative only): provider quoting often uses hourly interpreter plans (e.g., minimum 10 hours blocks) plus platform fees—so roughly 10–20+ hours of interpreter time × interpreter hourly rate (varies) = varied, contact for quote. Interpreting Agencies (custom quotes) • Companies like Translators USA, Languagers, Affordable Language Services, and others will provide live interpreters (in-person, remote, phone/videoconference) with tailored cost estimates. • Pricing is negotiated and depends on mode (simultaneous vs consecutive), number of languages/sessions, and event duration. Translators USA+1

2-day estimate: agency quotes typically per hour/day; expect $600–$3,000+ per day per interpreter for professional simultaneous services, plus any equipment/remote platform fees. Notes / how to compare: Phone/video interpreters charged per minute scale up quickly for long events. On-site or conference interpreters usually charge daily rates plus travel/equipment. CostHelper

sources.title: How much does remote simultaneous interpreting cost?
sources.snippet: How much does remote simultaneous interpreting cost? Interprefy provides tailor-made quotes that consist of RSI technology and the managed services costs required to make any meeting and event truly multilingual.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Platform solutions like Interprefy bundle technology + interpreter hours; you need an event quote rather than fixed published pricing. knowledge.interprefy.com
